title: Draft Strategy For QB's & RB's in 2022
description:
Field Yates, Daniel Dopp and Liz Loza discuss the best strategies to draft a winning fantasy team, including how to approach selecting QB’s and RB’s this season. Plus, how does league size impact selections.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
